## Gates (cont.)
Remember, CMOS gates like to invert

e.g., not((a or b) and c)

### Next up
Boolean algebra, gate-level design

# Basic Logic
Not, buf, and, or, nand, nor, xor, xnor

Everything can be done with CMOS gates (might take more than 1)

# Boolean Algebra
Nand/Nor are the two univeral gates, but we generally add a few more
